title: DayMinder 2015 Premiere Monthly Planner, Black Hard Cover, 7.5 x 9.18 x .68 Inches (G400H-00)
features: Take control of your busy schedule and get organized with this versatile monthly planner
12 months, January–December; 6.88 x 8.75 inch page size; unruled blocks
One month per two-page spread; past, current and four future months reference; storage pocket
Memo section with notes space; tabbed monthly dividers; Julian dates
Printed on quality paper containing 30% post-consumer waste; black hardcover with concealed wire binding; 7.5 x 9.18 x .68 inches
description: "Empowering you to “Dare to dream, Plan to succeed,” Day-Timer provides leading solutions in paper and digital planning that reflect the multi-faceted needs of our customer’s unique and ever-changing lifestyles. As a trusted name in personal organization for more than 65 years, we help individuals simplify their lives, organize and prioritize their daily activities, manage their time for work-life balance, and achieve their personal and professional goals.
Daily Planners – one day per page with or without appointment times – for detailed, short-term planning
Daily Planners – one day per page with or without appointment times – for detailed, short-term planning
Weekly Planners – block style or column style with or without appointment times – for both short- and long-term planning
Weekly Planners – block style or column style with or without appointment times – for both short- and long-term planning
Monthly Planners – one month per two-page spread – for long-term planning
Monthly Planners – one month per two-page spread – for long-term planning

Day-Timer planners and appointment books come in a wide variety of sizes and styles. Simple, classic formats for all your planning need fashion and photographic planners which bring color and creativity to your day. With soft or vivid colors and vibrant photographs, these are sure to add a little flair to your day.
